metadata.topic_title: Material Cyber Incident Reporting within Four Business Days

active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the materiality of the SolarWinds supply chain attack or Colonial Pipeline ransomware incident. Argue whether it met SEC reporting thresholds, considering quantitative costs, qualitative reputational impacts, and potential delays for national security. Reference the 'total mix' of information standard and vote on reporting compliance.
